data.title: Free Dirt
data.description:
I have a pile of free soil in front of my house on the street that is free for the taking. Good, clean, north Portland dirt. Come and get it! 
5535 N Denver Ave. 
P.S. I am not interested in paying anyone to remove it.

data.title: Free rocks and fill dirt.
data.description: I have a bunch of round river rocks and fill dirt if wanted you load. You can drive right to them Most of the large ones have been taken but still lots of medium and small. I am still sifting dirt so I am still finding lots more.

data.title: Free fill dirt
data.description:
Free fill dirt. Has quite a bit of small rock/gravel mixed in but no large debris. We have a lot! 6 yards or so. 
I also have shovels and helpers today, Saturday. We're on Villa Rd in old town.

data.title: Free  Fill Dirt!!!! Delivered

data.title: Free fill dirt
data.description: Free fill dirt in NE Portland. Located on the south side of NE Wystaria St. between NE 45th Ave. and NE 46th Ave. Help yourself anytime. There is about 1 yard available. I'll update this post as quantities change.

data.title: Dirt / River Rock / Broken Conrete
data.description:
I have some clean dirt, river rock and some broken concrete - left over from project. Please feel free to swing by and take. It is in driveway at 2538 NE 59th Avenue.

data.title: Free Dirt!
data.description: We have about 10 yards of dirt in a pile in the front yard. Take as much as you want. There may be an occasional rock, but it is pretty nice dirt.

data.title: fill dirt 50 cubic yards +/- take as much as you want you load & haul
data.description: Pile is under tarps in my driveway (see photo). I'm guessing there is 50 cubic yards - could be more or less. Clean dirt, some round rocks.
